programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: When the society does not have enough funds to celebrate the 'Ganesh Utsav', Tapu Sena comes up with a clever plan.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While Bhide and Hathi's performance impresses every member of the society, Popatlal gets a tricky task from Tapu Sena.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Taarak gets a task to recite poetry, he renders a beautiful piece about the members. Later, Champaklal suddenly disappears.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: Monty sees some goons kidnap his friend Annie and follows the kidnappers at a distance on his cycle. Meanwhile, Team CID discover the corpse of Annie's mother in her house.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: While trying to find a missing girl, Team CID realise that her colleagues are lying. Later, the office building collapses, almost killing Daya and reveals a mysterious tunnel below the structure.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The tattoo artist tricks the scammer into getting him to the studio.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when Dr Hathi arrives in a tempo and is unable to get off of it. Later, Babita gets excited about her birthday but gets disappointed when Iyer cannot celebrate with her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Babita learns that Iyer and all her loved ones are busy on her birthday, she feels upset. On the same day, Jethalal rushes to get a nice present for Babita when he assumes it is her birthday.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal reaches Babita's house to wish her assuming it is her birthday. However, chaos ensues when he leaks Iyer's surprise plans for her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal rushes to learn western dance forms when he learns about Babita's birthday party. Later, Daya feels devastated when the ladies of Gokuldham inform her about the party's invitation card.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As Babita's western birthday party approaches, the residents of Gokuldham Society begin preparing for the big day. Meanwhile, Jethalal gets unhappy when he does not receive the invitation card.

programme.desc: Parineeti Chopra and Ayushmann Khurrana are on the show to promote their upcoming film.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal wants to unearth the cash-for-admission scam going on in MK Gandhi College. He vows to bring out the truth and help those who don't get admission despite scoring well.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Taarak's situation becomes helpless as the police will not let them go. Later, Inspector Pandey admits he knows they are innocent, but he cannot find the evidence to prove it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham put their best efforts into getting Taarak and Jethalal out of jail. Later, they team up to hatch a plan to catch Khare.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal and Sodhi learn that no one has reported a missing child to the police. Daya gets anxious when Bhide holds a society meeting to collectively discuss Khushi's situation.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After considering all suggestions and options, Jethalal makes a decision. He talks about the possibility of adopting Khushi.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita brings frocks for Khushi. In the park, Champaklal sees a woman playing with Khushi, but she runs away when he tries to talk to her.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society are excited to spend time with Khushi. A strange couple notices Khushi in Gada Electronics.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is overjoyed when Jethalal tells her that he will begin the process of adopting Khushi.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is glad to see Khushi with Sonu. Jethalal discusses Khushi's adoption with the rest of the men in Gokuldham Society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya does not trust a mysterious woman who shows up and plays with Kushi. Kushi's parents eventually visit them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Bhide refuses to let Tapu Sena help in the preparations for Ganesh Chaturthi, Tapu plays a devious prank on him, resulting in Bhide getting scolded by all the residents.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While the residents of Gokuldham Society welcome Lord Ganesha into the society, Jethalal finally calls Daya and the other residents from London.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: As the festivities of Ganesh Chaturthi commence, the ladies of Gokuldham excitedly prepare to participate in a cultural dress competition.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sundar surprises the residents when he informs them of a cricket match in Gokuldham. He gives Jethalal an unlikely gift.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena organises a gathering wherein husbands and wives read poems for one another. However, Daya feels unwilling to participate knowing Jethalal is in London.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: On the occasion of Ganesh Chaturthi, the husbands and wives criticise each other through comedic poems. Daya presents a special poem for Jethalal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya receives a special surprise from Jethalal, who is in London for a business trip. Champaklal ends the event with a special poem for his late wife.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when Tapu notices that the donation box in the Ganpati mandap is open. Shreyas Talpade visits Gokuldham Society to give the residents a grand surprise.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak and the members of Gokuldham Society inform Shreyas Talpade about the adventures conquered in the year.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Daya starts the aarti, Jethalal surprisingly shows up. Everyone in the colony is excited to have him back.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Bhide gets ready to go out with his wife, Popatlal calls for a meeting and makes a serious accusation against him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal demands that Bhide reveal the contents of a sealed box. Bhide fights back against the unfair claims, determined to find a way to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal gets in trouble after Babita gets shocked by a faulty appliance she bought from his store. More customers report the same issue, leaving him puzzled.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Following an electric shock, everyone frantically attempts to switch off the main power but runs into another problem. Left with no alternatives, they contact Bhide for help.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While waiting for Bhide's return with the keys to restore electricity, the members of the colony come together for a table tennis game.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Abdul says he does not have the keys and that the electrician has them. The colony members are angry and blame Bhide for the issue.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone is relieved when the electricity is restored to their homes. Bhide and Popatlal are worried due to the lack of communication from Bhootnath regarding the renovations.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal finds himself in trouble as Tapu informs the police that Jethalal has hired him as a child labourer at his store. The police show up at Jethalal's store to interrogate him.
